smart_contract:
def contract():
  
    global_key = Bytes("key")

    update =  Seq(
            App.globalPut(global_key, Txn.application_args[0]),
            Return(Int(1))  # Program accepts arbitrary update
        )
  
    program = Cond(
               [Txn.application_id() == Int(0), Seq(
            App.globalPut(global_key, Bytes("Initial value")),
            Return(Int(1))         )],
        [Txn.on_completion() == OnComplete.UpdateApplication, update]
    )

    return program

if __name__ == "__main__":
   
    print(compileTeal(contract(), mode=Mode.Application, version=5))
